name: Road Repair
description:
Patch up potholes and  clear debris  out of the path of an increasingly erratic driver.

Controls

Click on items to pick them up. Click again on their designated targets to place them. If you miss the target, items will be dropped after 3 seconds.

Credits

Max: Music, Sound Effects

Diane: Programming, Project Management, UI

Jackie: Art, Animations

Cory: Art Integration, Group Mom

Nicky: Programming

Everyone: Design

Notes

This game was made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2020. The theme was "Repair".  RoadRepairGGJVersion is the original version submitted for the jam. RoadRepairExtendedVersion was updated the following day. It has various bug fixes and extended gameplay.
